attributes.action: Repeal the smoking ban in pubs and clubs that do not serve food and stop being misled by ASH and their ilk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As bingo halls and pubs close, surely we have made a mistake. Why has this issue caused so much hate? smokers and non smokers got on fine before the ban. Our elderly smokers are suffering as a result, with them staying at home with no social life. Surely some form of compromise could be reached that is fair to both sides.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
